siteMetadata.title: Jo Sprague - Software Engineer
siteMetadata.description: I work with JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Python and related tools and frameworks. I'm interested in working with teams that have a mission or product I'm passionate about.

markdownRemark.html: I built this app to learn Solidity. It mimics a simple Twitter poll with the votes being tracked on the Ethereum blockchain.
markdownRemark.excerpt: I built this app to learn Solidity. It mimics a simple Twitter poll with the votes being tracked on the Ethereum blockchain.

frontmatter.title: Ethereum Poll App
